adHeader: Rent HULA HOOPS for Any Event!
adDetails: Liven up any party or event with a bunch of hula hoops to play with! These hoops are weighted with water to provide a smooth and graceful revolution and a great core exercise. Great for all level hoopers and all ages, these are ideal for exercise, hula dancing, tricks with hoops, and relaxing motion. They are made in Santa Rosa with love and come in many fun colors! Rent hoops by the hour or by the day, delivery may be included for an additional fee.
